Hellplague:
 
As her head was smashed into the ground, she reached up and got her arm around his head, and used the momentum to flip over.  The hold around his neck should sub due him, she hoped.  Her head hurt a lot, but she would fight to the end.
"You won't win, we're already trashing your cannon, and then we'll trash YOU!"


: : Rodimus Prime : :

As Hellplague tackled Rodimus, he wrapped his right arm around her neck and dropped back, trying to smash her head to the ground. This is a wrestling move known as a DDT.


robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
Hellplague:
 
Hellplague was shot in the back, then assaulted in the front.  SHe fell to the ground, injured, and inraged.  She got up and dashed toward Rodimus, closing the gap between them in a matter of seconds.  She tried to tackle him, so she could tear him apart.

Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
: : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :

The sounds of incoming fire drew Rodimus' attention up. He saw that Hellplague and gone into the sky and was shooting down on him. He tried to move. He managed to avoid the shots but they tore up the ground around him causing him to fall. He rolled to his back and returned fire with three plasma blasts and optic lasers.

From an angle behind Hellplague Kup shot two blasts from his rifle at the enemy femme.

Rodimus Prime: No, Kup. This is my fight!


robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
Hellplague:
 
Now in a blinding cloud, Hellplague jumped back, taking a hit in the leg.  She fell on her back, but then lifted into the air. She looks around, now very mad.  She spots what looked like Rodimus and opened fire, concentrating it on where she thought the Maximal leader stood.

Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
: : Rodimus Prime : :

As Hellplague avoided the bodyslam Rodimus spun around, bringing his blaster to bear on Hellplague. They both would be somewhat kneeling on the ground, weapons pointed at the other in a standoff.

Rodimus Prime: Normally I'd have reservations about fighting a femmebot but quite frankly... you piss me off!

Roddy uses his optic blasters to stir up the ground in front of Hellplague creating a blinding dust cloud between them. Roddy then rolls to avoid any incoming fire and shoots four plasma shots back at Hellplague's last position.


robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
Hellplague/ Organics/ Wolfblade/ Malice/ Injustice:
 
Hellplague veered to one side to narrowly avoid Rodimus' counter attack.  She landed and skidded to a stop and levelled her disruptors at Rodimus.
"Looks like it's you and me," she said, grinning devilishly.
 
Organics charged over to the cannon site and decided to square off with Blacknightmare.
"Okay, where's Malice?  We want him back!" the valkyrie said, tightening the grip on her sword.
 
Wolfblade ducked under the larger bots in her way and made her way to the cannon.  The she saw two bots trying to tear it up.  She fired a shot close to one, and both stopped what hey were doing and stepped into full view.  
 
It was Malice, and a bot who looked a whole lot like him.  Wolfblade lowered her rifle, she only stared at Malice, who did nothing.  
"Malice..." the femme said taking a step toward him.
Malice said nothing, he did not recognize this litle femme, why did she look at him like that.  
"Do I know you, miss?" The Hunter Killer asked, flexing his claws.
"Malice, don't you recognize me?  It's me, Wolfblade.  Come on, quit messing around, let's go back to base, we'll fix whatever they did to you.  Comeback with me," the femme said, extending a hand out to Malice.
Injustice began to crack up.  This was absurd, Malice was a Minion, right?
"Go play somewhere else, little gil, we'e busy," the clone said, smirking.
"YOU SHUT UP!  I DON'T REMEMBER ASKING YOU, YOU FREAK!" Wolfblade snapped, loud enough for anyone to hear.
Malice, meanwhile, was secretly deep in his own conflict.  Who was she really?  she semed like she knew him very well, and somehow, she seemed familiar somehow, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.
 
Did he?

Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: Well Rattrap, try to spot any generals among the Sweeps. If you do spot them, thake em' out!

Rodimus the notices Hellplague diveing at him. Rodimus reaches upwards to grab Hellplague, attempting a bodyslam.


Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@...> wrote:
OOC:  Sorry, got a little ahead of myself.

Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Malice/ Injustice/ 
Necross/ Splattercannon:

Hellplague reeled back as Rodimus returned fire.  He armor bore the 
brunt of the damage, but it slowed her down for a minute before she 
dived down to engage Rodimus in one on one combat.  
"Blacknightmare!  They're a little thick here!  Time for that back 
up!" the Sweep commander called into her comm link.

Organics and wolfblade were more or less holding their own with the 
Sweeps.  Wolfblade was able to keep ahead of the larger bots and 
blast holes in them.  Organics was flying circles around the Sweeps, 
but they kept coming.

Megatron dashed toward a group of Sweeps that had congregated around 
Hydras.  The clone drew his massive sword and charged into the melee, 
each swing of his sword fell several of Unicron's footsoldiers.  He 
made his way close enough to ask the Predacon leader a question:
"Are you well enough to fight?"

"Let's go!  They need us now!" Malice said as he hung on to 
Blacknightmare.
"Yeah, I want a piece of the action too!" Injustice exclaimed, 
wiggling in Nightstrike's grip.
Necross remained in his robot form, silent through the whole ordeal.  
Splattercannon too, remained silent, but wanted to go in and shot 
some Maximals full of holes.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I'll let it go this time, but unless the rules changed in my

their consent.
>  
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup/Darkangel/DeathStar/SharpClaws/Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Rodimus spins around after the disruptor blast strike his shoulder, 
blowing part of his armor off.
> 
> Rodimus: Damn, gettinf careless, Roddy.
> 
> Rodimus draws his plasma rifle from subspace and locates 
Hellplague. He returns fire with three shots.
> 
> Kup is situated behind a large boulder. He takes careful aim, 
fireing shot after shot at Sweeps.
> 
> Darkangel has flown into the air and drawn his swords.
> He dives by Sweeps at quick speeds, slashing with his swords, 
taking many out.
>  
> In star-fighter mode, DeathStar engages several Sweeps in a 
dogfight.
>  
> SharpClaw unleashes his claws and stands ready on the battle field.
>  
> SharpClaws: Ok you Unicron spawns, come down here and fight!
>  
> Wolfensten is launching his grappling hook and different Sweeps. 
Once it attaches to one, he pulls them down causing them to crash.
> 
> Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:

her

her

>

> it.  The disruptor blasts streaked toward him, striking him in the 
> shoulder.  
> 
> Megatron waited, patiently, then saw his opperunity.  He jumped 
into 
> the air, locked on, and fired a 35% shot from his fusion cannon.  
The 
> blast streaked through the sky, taking a huge swath from the Sweep 
> swarm over head.
> 
>

and

<DIV>Hellplague:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>As her head was smashed into the ground, she reached up and got her arm around his head, and used the momentum to flip over.  The hold around his neck should sub due him, she hoped.  Her head hurt a lot, but she would fight to the end.</DIV>
<DIV>"You won't win, we're already trashing your cannon, and then we'll trash YOU!"<BR><BR></DIV><B><I></I></B>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>As Hellplague tackled Rodimus, he wrapped his right arm around her neck and dropped back, trying to smash her head to the ground. This is a wrestling move known as a DDT.</P>
<DIV><BR><BR><B><I>robert riley <bustercross365@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV>Hellplague:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Hellplague was shot in the back, then assaulted in the front.  SHe fell to the ground, injured, and inraged.  She got up and dashed toward Rodimus, closing the gap between them in a matter of seconds.  She tried to tackle him, so she could tear him apart.<BR><BR><B><I>Richard Allen <roborick007@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>The sounds of incoming fire drew Rodimus' attention up. He saw that Hellplague and gone into the sky and was shooting down on him. He tried to move. He managed to avoid the shots but they tore up the ground around him causing him to fall. He rolled to his back and returned fire with three plasma blasts and optic lasers.</P>
<P>From an angle behind Hellplague Kup shot two blasts from his rifle at the enemy femme.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>No, Kup. This is my fight!</P>
<DIV><BR><BR><B><I>robert riley <bustercross365@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV>Hellplague:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Now in a blinding cloud, Hellplague jumped back, taking a hit in the leg.  She fell on her back, but then lifted into the air. She looks around, now very mad.  She spots what looked like Rodimus and opened fire, concentrating it on where she thought the Maximal leader stood.<BR><BR><B><I>Richard Allen <roborick007@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>As Hellplague avoided the bodyslam Rodimus spun around, bringing his blaster to bear on Hellplague. They both would be somewhat kneeling on the ground, weapons pointed at the other in a standoff.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Normally I'd have reservations about fighting a femmebot but quite frankly... you piss me off!</P>
<P>Roddy uses his optic blasters to stir up the ground in front of Hellplague creating a blinding dust cloud between them. Roddy then rolls to avoid any incoming fire and shoots four plasma shots back at Hellplague's last position.</P>
<DIV><BR><BR><B><I>robert riley <bustercross365@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV>Hellplague/ Organics/ Wolfblade/ Malice/ Injustice:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Hellplague veered to one side to narrowly avoid Rodimus' counter attack.  She landed and skidded to a stop and levelled her disruptors at Rodimus.</DIV>
<DIV>"Looks like it's you and me," she said, grinning devilishly.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Organics charged over to the cannon site and decided to square off with Blacknightmare.</DIV>
<DIV>"Okay, where's Malice?  We want him back!" the valkyrie said, tightening the grip on her sword.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Wolfblade ducked under the larger bots in her way and made her way to the cannon.  The she saw two bots trying to tear it up.  She fired a shot close to one, and both stopped what hey were doing and stepped into full view.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>It was Malice, and a bot who looked a whole lot like him.  Wolfblade lowered her rifle, she only stared at Malice, who did nothing.  </DIV>
<DIV>"Malice..." the femme said taking a step toward him.</DIV>
<DIV>Malice said nothing, he did not recognize this litle femme, why did she look at him like that.  </DIV>
<DIV>"Do I know you, miss?" The Hunter Killer asked, flexing his claws.</DIV>
<DIV>"Malice, don't you recognize me?  It's me, Wolfblade.  Come on, quit messing around, let's go back to base, we'll fix whatever they did to you.  Comeback with me," the femme said, extending a hand out to Malice.</DIV>
<DIV>Injustice began to crack up.  This was absurd, Malice was a Minion, right?</DIV>
<DIV>"Go play somewhere else, little gil, we'e busy," the clone said, smirking.</DIV>
<DIV>"YOU SHUT UP!  I DON'T REMEMBER ASKING YOU, YOU FREAK!" Wolfblade snapped, loud enough for anyone to hear.</DIV>
<DIV>Malice, meanwhile, was secretly deep in his own conflict.  Who was she really?  she semed like she knew him very well, and somehow, she seemed familiar somehow, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Did he?<BR><BR><B><I>Richard Allen <roborick007@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Well Rattrap, try to spot any generals among the Sweeps. If you do spot them, thake em' out!</P>
<P>Rodimus the notices Hellplague diveing at him. Rodimus reaches upwards to grab Hellplague, attempting a bodyslam.</P>
<DIV><BR><BR><B><I>Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid"><TT>OOC:  Sorry, got a little ahead of myself.<BR><BR>Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Malice/ Injustice/ <BR>Necross/ Splattercannon:<BR><BR>Hellplague reeled back as Rodimus returned fire.  He armor bore the <BR>brunt of the damage, but it slowed her down for a minute before she <BR>dived down to engage Rodimus in one on one combat.  <BR>"Blacknightmare!  They're a little thick here!  Time for that back <BR>up!" the Sweep commander called into her comm link.<BR><BR>Organics and wolfblade were more or less holding their own with the <BR>Sweeps.  Wolfblade was able to keep ahead of the larger bots and <BR>blast holes in them.  Organics was flying circles around the Sweeps, <BR>but they kept coming.<BR><BR>Megatron dashed toward a group of Sweeps that had congregated around <BR>Hydras.  The clone drew his massive sword and
 charged into the melee, <BR>each swing of his sword fell several of Unicron's footsoldiers.  He <BR>made his way close enough to ask the Predacon leader a question:<BR>"Are you well enough to fight?"<BR><BR>"Let's go!  They need us now!" Malice said as he hung on to <BR>Blacknightmare.<BR>"Yeah, I want a piece of the action too!"
